title: State Debt Collection Amendments
general_provisions: This bill modifies provisions related to state debt collection.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>modifies the duties of the Office of State Debt Collection (office);<hr><ltbullet>allows the office to hold title to real property or dispose or acquire surplus property, if doing so is incidental to execution or collection proceedings;<hr><ltbullet>provides that the Department of Health and Human Services may enforce certain rights to recovery against a decedent's estate regardless of any contrary provisions in the Utah Uniform Probate Code;<hr><ltbullet>requires notice to the office when a person files an application or a petition for probate;<hr><ltbullet>exempts proceedings to enforce or collect a criminal account receivable, civil judgment of restitution, or civil account receivable from certain time limitations in the Utah Uniform Probate Code;<hr><ltbullet>addresses enforcement of a civil judgment of restitution or civil account receivable; and<hr><ltbullet>makes technical and conforming changes.
